name: marq
description: Generate markdown posts from API responses

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run pretty && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.clean: rimraf coverage lib test-dir posts test-dir-empty
scripts.test:coverage: npm run clean && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text -- npm run test:specs -- --reporter=dot
scripts.prepare: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run test:specs
scripts.test:watch: npm run pretty && npm run test:specs -- --reporter=dot --watch
